Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I\'m Uburian, an enthusiast of the spacecrafts and the hard science fiction.

I found this game thanks to a friend a few days ago, and since then I have been enjoying to the fullest with KSP. Since i was a child, i have always wanted to have a good space program simulator, and no doubt that this game has far exceeded any other spaceship simulator I\'ve ever used.

I am very excited about this game, and i will try to be a great contributor to the community.

LetÂ´s lift off!

A friendly greeting

Uburian

(Sorry if my english sounds a bit strange, i\'m from the Basque country ;D)
Welcome! You\'re just in time for the .12x1 experimental release, which includes a Mun to fly to and land on!

Thank you very much for the welcome

I have already downloaded the 0.12 x1 version, and I\'ve done a couple of missions to the moon. So far none has been a success, but at least I achieved a lunar orbit

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Captain Sordid

Same here. I\'m re-configuring my Vostok 2 to carry a lander payload to the Mun. The lander parts I\'m using can be found here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2444.0

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the forums!

Hope you don\'t fail as much as me!

JupiterII
